title: CIRG Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 07 Young Professional Posts
description: The Central Institute for Research on Goats (CIRG Mathura), has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 07 Young Professional Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc, M.Sc, B.Pharm., D.Pharm., BVS.c, MVSc, and Post Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the CIRG Recruitment 2025 . Here we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligi...
